sense.gloss: reality, actuality, truth, fact, actual conditions
(in broth) pieces of meat, vegetable, etc.
as a matter of fact, by the way, to tell you the truth, to be honest, frankly
implementation (e.g. of a system), materialization, materialisation, realization, realisation, actualization, actualisation
enforcement, implementation, putting into practice, carrying out, operation, working (e.g. working parameters), enactment
execution (e.g. of a plan), carrying out, practice, action, implementation, fulfillment, realization
certain, sure, definite, reliable, sound, solid, safe, secure
indeed, really, absolutely, truly, actually, very, quite
to actually feel, to have a real feeling (that ...), to experience personally
substantive, substantial, essential, real (e.g. interest rate)
in essence, in effect, essentially, effectively, practically
achievements, actual results, accomplishments, past results, track record
(real) ability, true strength, merit, efficiency, competency
(practical) business, business practice, business affairs, (actual) work
real condition, actual circumstances, actual state of affairs
practice (in the field), training (esp. practical and hands-on), practical exercise, drill
substance, essence, entity, subject, content, reality, true form
actual existence, real existence, existing in real life
actual state (of things), real state, actual condition, real condition, actual scene
reporting live, live coverage, live broadcasting
Let's Play (YouTube, etc. playthrough of a video game)
combat, battle, action, active service, actual fighting
live filming (as opposed to animation), actual picture (as opposed to a drawing), photographic image (as opposed to a drawing, computer-generated image, etc.)
real picture or story (as opposed to fiction, imaginary scene, etc.), describing actual scenes (in writing, drawings, paintings, etc.), documentary (film)
implementation (e.g. of a feature), installation (of equipment), mounting, packaging
ornamental plant used primarily for the visual effect of its fruit
seed (of a fruit), pit, pip, stone
tongue (projecting strip on a board that fits into a groove on another board)

sdata.j: ↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓のみが↑美↑↓うつく↓しい。
sdata.e: Nothing is beautiful but the truth.

sdata.j: 「↑実↑↓じつ↓を↑言↑↓い↓うと、↑俺↑↓おれ↓、↑高所↑↓こうしょ↓↑恐怖症↑↓きょうふしょう↓なんだ。」　「↑臆病者↑↓おくびょうもの↓っ！」
sdata.e: To tell you the truth, I am scared of heights. "You are a coward!"

sdata.j: 「↑実↑↓み↓を↑言↑↓い↓うと、↑俺↑↓おれ↓、↑高所↑↓こうしょ↓↑恐怖症↑↓きょうふしょう↓なんだ」「↑臆病者↑↓おくびょうもの↓っ！」
sdata.e: To tell you the truth, I am scared of heights. "You are a coward!"

sdata.j: ↑作↑↓つく↓り↑事↑↓ごと↓はすべて、↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓だ。
sdata.e: All that which is invented, is true.

sdata.j: ↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓もできないのに、↑一体↑↓いったい↓↑何↑↓なに↓を↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓だと↑信↑↓しん↓じるのだ？
sdata.e: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かを↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓しようとする↑場合↑↓ばあい↓、それが↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓であるという↑確信↑↓かくしん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑何↑↓なん↓らかの↑手助↑↓てだす↓けになる。
sdata.e: When you're trying to prove something, it helps to know it's true.

sdata.j: それは↑全↑↓まった↓くの↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓です。
sdata.e: That's the absolute truth.

sdata.j: ↑理論↑↓りろん↓↑上↑↓じょう↓、↑理論↑↓りろん↓と↑実行↑↓じっこう↓の↑間↑↓あいだ↓には↑何↑↓なん↓の↑違↑↓ちが↓いもないが、↑実際↑↓じっさい↓↑上↑↓じょう↓↑違↑↓ちが↓いはあるものだ。
sdata.e: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.

sdata.j: どんな↑意見↑↓いけん↓も↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓と↑誤↑↓あやま↓りの↑混合↑↓こんごう↓だ。
sdata.e: Every opinion is a mixture of truth and mistakes.

sdata.j: パソコンを↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑実用↑↓じつよう↓↑的↑↓てき↓です。
sdata.e: It's practical to have a laptop.

sdata.j: ↑税金↑↓ぜいきん↓を↑払↑↓はら↓ったら↑実生活↑↓じっせいかつ↓の↑始↑↓はじ↓まりだ。
sdata.e: Life begins when you pay taxes.

sdata.j: ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑実現↑↓じつげん↓するのに↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑良↑↓よ↓いのは↑目↑↓め↓を↑覚↑↓さ↓ますことである。
sdata.e: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑話↑↓はな↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should tell him the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You should tell him the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better tell him the truth.

sdata.j: ↑神↑↓かみ↓の↑実在↑↓じつざい↓を↑信↑↓しん↓じますか。
sdata.e: Do you believe in God?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑分↑↓ふん↓↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑知↑↓し↓っていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I take it that you are fully acquainted with the facts.

sdata.j: あなたは↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑分↑↓ふん↓↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑知↑↓し↓っていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I take it that you are fully acquainted with the facts.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑実際↑↓じっさい↓に↑事故↑↓じこ↓を↑見↑↓み↓たのですか。
sdata.e: Did you actually see the accident?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓には↑忠実↑↓ちゅうじつ↓でなければならない。
sdata.e: You should be true to your friends.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑友達↑↓ともだち↓には↑忠実↑↓ちゅうじつ↓でなければならない。
sdata.e: You should be true to your friends.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: You must face the facts.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなくてはならない。
sdata.e: You must face the facts.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなくてはいけない。
sdata.e: You must face the facts.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑言↑↓い↓うべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have told me the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓を↑実行↑↓じっこう↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should carry out his offer.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑現実↑↓げんじつ↓と↑一致↑↓いっち↓させるべきだ。
sdata.e: You should make your ideas correspond with reality.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなんらかの↑口実↑↓こうじつ↓をつくらなければならない。
sdata.e: You'll have to manufacture some kind of excuse.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はためらわずに↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑確↑↓たし↓かめるべきだ。
sdata.e: You should make sure of the fact without hesitation.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑重視↑↓じゅうし↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should emphasize that fact.
